client

Class Client

  • java.lang.Object
    • client.Client
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    client.ChatIF

    public class Client
extends java.lang.Object
implements client.ChatIF
    This class implements chatIF and uses the client to talk to the server. The client has all the database commends.
